text: The Treaty of Berlin was signed on 24 April 1926 between Germany and the Soviet Union. Each promised to stay neutral if the other was attacked by another country within five years. == Other websites == *The Text of the Agreement Category:1926 in Europe Category:1920s in Germany Category:History of the Soviet Union Category:Treaties of the Soviet Union Berlin 1926 Category:20th century in Berlin
title: Treaty of Berlin (1926)
